address: via Monsignor Di Mattina 8, località Ficogrande
description: At this restaurant, dine under a pergola with superb views of the sea and Strombolicchio – the perfect setting for any occasion. The menu focuses on fish, including raw and dry-aged fish options. The first courses have a local flavour and are particularly delicious.
